World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 8 日星期一 18:52:59 GMT 120
Israeli man pleads for his release in latest Gaza hostage videoElad Katzir, an Israeli farmer held hostage in Gaza for over three months, was seen pleading for his freedom in a video posted online by Palestinian group Islamic Jihad on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:29:14 GMT F23SJ6JR5VL7TLFETIAVKYOGOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-man-pleads-his-release-latest-gaza-hostage-video-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中东
UK condemns 'intimidation and violence' in Bangladesh electionBritain on Monday condemned what it called "acts of intimidation and violence" that took place during the general election in Bangladesh, raising concerns over the number of arrests of opposition party members. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:00:43 GMT GFYIKGKUNZK3FPUWHF2MXZPBRI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/uk-condemns-intimidation-violence-bangladesh-election-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Canada, partners take Iran to UN council over downed Ukrainian jetCanada, Britain, Sweden and Ukraine on Monday formally complained to the U.N. aviation council in their bid to hold Iran accountable for the downing of a passenger airliner in January 2020 that killed 176 people, they said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 17:45:40 GMT XT7P22WATNP45MPCXCIR2LZTFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-partners-take-iran-un-council-over-downed-ukrainian-jet-2024-01-08/Reuters世界
French PM Borne resigns, Macron to name new governmentFrench Prime Minister Elisabeth Borne resigned on Monday, as President Emmanuel Macron seeks to give a new impetus to his second mandate ahead of European parliament elections and the Paris Olympics this summer. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 17:13:58 GMT KGCMEZSM3FPFFBGDR5URV4G55U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-pm-elisabeth-borne-resigns-macrons-office-2024-01-08/Michel Rose世界欧洲
Scholz berates EU allies over "insufficient" military support for UkraineGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Monday the majority of countries in the European Union were not delivering sufficient weapons to Ukraine to help it battle a Russian invasion, calling upon allies to increase their efforts. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:53:28 GMT SLSY2VRNRNJS3HN3AHMC3AQ34Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/scholz-berates-eu-allies-over-insufficient-military-support-ukraine-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Legal migration to EU must increase as workforce ages, commissioner saysLegal migration to the European Union will have to increase by 1 million people a year to make up for losses in the bloc's ageing workforce, the EU's home affairs chief said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:43:38 GMT FG43NU5UXVLF7BMMB6VGZOVSRI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/legal-migration-eu-must-increase-workforce-ages-commissioner-says-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Spain considers nationwide hospital mask rule, as flu, COVID hit EuropeSpain's government proposed a nationwide mandate for people to wear masks in hospitals and health clinics on Monday, and Italy said respiratory illness infection rates had hit a record, as flu and COVID spread across Europe. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:37:47 GMT OAYIQW67OZJXBCMKAG2KLPNMNM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spain-considers-nationwide-hospital-mask-rule-flu-covid-hit-europe-2024-01-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Bosnian Serb leader tempers secession talk as U.S. exerts pressureThe nationalist leader of Bosnia's post-war Serb region said on Monday he had no plans to seek secession, appearing to step back from earlier calls for a breakaway republic just as the United States stepped up pressure against him. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:28:37 GMT NZNOKHE4MBIFNG5RYB3QF5XLAI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bosnian-serb-leader-tempers-secession-talk-us-exerts-Pressure-2024-01-08/Ivana Sekularac世界欧洲
Bangladesh PM faces tougher, more uncertain new term, analysts sayStabilising a fractious political landscape and fixing an economy still reeling from the ripple effects of the Russia-Ukraine war should top Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's agenda for her next five-year term, analysts said on Monday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:23:30 GMT YPLF44EVYVI6VNSCKZOUEQJCTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-pm-faces-tougher-more-uncertain-new-term-analysts-say-2024-01-08/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
Astrobotic's lunar lander suffers glitch in space, moon mission fate unclearA privately built moon lander launched Monday morning to make the first U.S. soft lunar landing in more than 50 years failed to enter its correct orientation in space, suffering what its owners termed an "anomaly" that calls the mission's fate into question. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 16:09:12 GMT CIG7OI7AXBNPNARBSA26QW4HDE https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/astrobotics-lunar-lander-suffers-glitch-space-moon-mission-fate-unclear-2024-01-08/Reuters技术空间
Congo governor tells security forces to leave home of presidential runner-up KatumbiAuthorities in the Democratic Republic of Congo on Monday ordered security forces to leave the home of main opposition politician Moise Katumbi, which they had surrounded in what the provincial governor called a "faux pas". Mon, 08 Jan 2024 15:47:17 GMT KUPLHF3Z4NJ3DMCTU5WFQQUVCI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-security-forces-surround-home-presidential-runner-up-katumbi-2024-01-08/Reuters世界非洲
